item.description:
Judy Noonan is planning on doing a demo( approx 40 minutes) from Nancy Curry's book "Texture Effects for Rubber Stamping".
Martha Goutal will demonstrate crayon resist (a technique some of you may remember from grade school!), an an embossing powder resist from the book by Bernie Berlin.

* * * * *


Bring what you have of these things; we will be providing some for sharing. We'll also have lots of papers and ATC blanks. We're asking, due to space and time constraints, that you NOT bring a lot of suppliesl One small container should be plenty, just your basic kit, with these additional items if you have them.

* * * * *
Materials List:

glossy cardstock
a few dye ink pads (Judy likes Adirondack in Caramel, Current Raisin, and Espresso)
black ink pad
clear embossing and/or resist stamp pad(s)
phrase stamp (we'll have a variety of these, so if you haven't got any, don't worry)
a *few* favorite rubber stamps (especially those that have solid areas; lines and filigree do not work so well with this technique)
heat gun (if you have one)

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: May Workshop/Demo - Resist Techniques
